values.label: Arrival, completed
values.comment: The goods/consignment/equipment/means of transport has arrived.

values.comment: The goods/consignment/equipment or a means of transport has arrived in a defective condition.

values.comment: The goods/consignment/equipment has been returned by the recipient.

values.label: Delayed, at origin
values.comment: The goods/consignment/equipment/means of transport has been delayed at the origin.

values.label: Held, by logistic service provider
values.comment: The goods/consignment/equipment has been held by the logistic service provider.

values.label: Incident occurred but accepted by ordering party
values.comment: An incident has occurred but has been accepted by the ordering party.

values.label: Delivery party' premises closed during normal hours
values.comment: The premises of the delivery party were closed during normal hours.

values.label: Delivery incomplete, time shortage
values.comment: The delivery of the goods/consignment/equipment could not be completed due to a shortage of time to handle the delivery.

values.label: Despatch, preparation error
values.comment: An error occurred during the preparation of the despatch.

values.label: Undefined incident attributed to logistic server provider
values.comment: An undefined incident has occurred which has been attributed to the logistic service provider.

values.label: Instruction to despatch, received
values.comment: The instruction to despatch has been received.

values.label: Despatch, under preparation
values.comment: The despatch of the goods/consignment/equipment is in preparation.

values.label: Return in progress
values.comment: The goods/consignment/equipment is being returned.

values.label: Instruction to despatch, cancelled
values.comment: The instruction to despatch has been cancelled.

values.label: Delivery refused, by recipient
values.comment: The delivery of the goods/consignment/equipment has been refused by the recipient.

values.label: Goods, held by third party on instruction from owner
values.comment: Goods are held under control of a third party following an instruction from the owner of the goods.

values.label: Weight or volume loss
values.comment: The goods have suffered a weight or volume loss.

values.label: Moved, internally
values.comment: The goods/consignment/equipment has been moved internally.

values.label: Consignment partially stolen
values.comment: The consignment has been partially stolen.

values.label: Consignment partially lost or missing
values.comment: The consignment is partially lost or missing.

values.label: Destroyed
values.comment: The goods/consignment/equipment has been destroyed.

values.label: Action by logistics service provider
values.comment: An action was taken by the logistics service provider.

values.label: Action by logistics service provider on instruction by owner
values.comment: An action was taken by the logistics service provider as instructed by owner of the goods.

values.label: Document, refused
values.comment: The document has been refused.

values.label: Seals, damaged
values.comment: The seals on the equipment have been damaged.

values.label: Seals, broken
values.comment: The seals on the equipment have been broken.

values.label: Seals, tampered
values.comment: The seals on the equipment have been tampered.

values.label: Collection/pick-up, business closed
values.comment: The goods/consignment/equipment could not be collected/picked-up as the business was closed.

values.label: Collection/pick-up, changed schedule
values.comment: The goods/consignment/equipment cannot be collected/picked-up at the arranged time because of a change of schedule.

values.label: Collection/pick-up, further address needed
values.comment: A further address is needed to effect collection/pick-up of the goods/consignment/ equipment.

values.label: Collection/pick-up, industrial dispute
values.comment: The goods/consignment/equipment cannot be collected/picked-up due to an industrial dispute.

values.label: Collection/pick-up, equipment failure
values.comment: The goods/consignment/equipment cannot be collected/picked-up due to a failure in the equipment.

values.label: Document, incorrect
values.comment: The document for the goods/consignments/equipment is incorrect.

values.label: Collection/pick-up, scheduled past cut-off time
values.comment: The goods/consignment/equipment to be collected/picked-up has been scheduled past the cut-off time.

values.label: Collection/pick-up, adverse weather conditions
values.comment: Adverse weather conditions have affected collection/pick-up.

values.label: Unloading, completed from a means of transport
values.comment: The goods/consignment/equipment has been unloaded from a means of transport.

values.label: Deliverable
values.comment: The goods/consignment/equipment can be delivered.

values.label: Not deliverable
values.comment: The goods/consignment/equipment cannot be delivered.

values.label: Handed over
values.comment: The goods/consignment/equipment has been handed over to another party.

values.label: Signature required
values.comment: A signature is required.

values.label: Defined incident attributed to logistic server provider
values.comment: A defined incident has occurred which has been attributed to the logistic service provider.

values.label: Delivery not completed, business closed, inventory count
values.comment: The goods/consignment/equipment could not be delivered as the business was closed due to inventory count.

values.label: Delivery not completed, business closed on Saturday
values.comment: The goods/consignment/equipment could not be delivered as the business was closed on Saturday.

values.label: Delivery not completed, business closed on national holiday
values.comment: The goods/consignment/equipment could not be delivered as the business was closed on a national holiday.

values.label: En route, via local route
values.comment: The goods/consignment/equipment/means of transport is moving to destination via a local route.

values.label: En route, via national route
values.comment: The goods/consignment/equipment/means of transport is moving to destination via a national route.

values.label: En route, via international route
values.comment: The goods/consignment/equipment/means of transport is moving to destination via an international route.

values.label: Transport terminated, mail not received
values.comment: The transport of the goods/consignment/equipment/means of transport has been terminated and the mail has not been received.

values.label: Bill of Lading issued
values.comment: The Bill of Lading for the goods/consignment/equipment has been issued.

values.label: Cleared, by logistics service provider
values.comment: The goods/consignment/equipment/means of transport has been cleared by logistics service provider.

values.label: Delivery, expected
values.comment: The goods/consignment/equipment expected to be delivered.

values.label: Measured
values.comment: The goods/consignment/equipment/means of transport has been measured.

values.label: Loading, ready
values.comment: The goods/consignment/equipment is ready to be loaded onto a means of transport.

values.label: Arrival, at yard
values.comment: The goods/consignment/equipment/means of transport has arrived at the yard.

values.label: Departure, from yard
values.comment: The goods/consignment/equipment/means of transport has departed from the yard.

values.label: Accepted at interchange point
values.comment: The goods/consignment/equipment/means of transport has been accepted at the interchange point.

values.label: Alerted, no action taken
values.comment: No action taken after an alert in relation to the goods/consignment/equipment/means of transport.

values.label: Transshipment to another wagon
values.comment: The goods/consignment has been transhipped to another wagon.

values.label: Trip plan revised manually
values.comment: The transport route has been re-programmed manually.

values.label: Special wagon handling arranged
values.comment: The handling of a special wagon has been arranged.

values.label: Equipment, emptied
values.comment: The equipment has been emptied.

values.label: Equipment, loaded
values.comment: The equipment has been loaded.

values.label: Equipment, held by transport operator
values.comment: The equipment has been held by the transport operator.

values.label: Equipment, held by terminal operator
values.comment: The equipment has been held by the terminal operator.

values.label: Equipment, storage period at terminal exceeded
values.comment: The equipment storage period at a transport terminal has been exceeded.

values.label: Equipment, held by equipment operator
values.comment: The equipment has been held by the equipment operator.

values.label: Equipment, not released by equipment operator
values.comment: The equipment has not been released by the equipment operator.

values.label: Delivery Order Issued
values.comment: Delivery Order for the goods/consignment/equipment/means has been issued.

values.label: Cleared for container release
values.comment: The procedures of containers release from container yard have been cleared by all authorities and private sectors.
